hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:The Prophet (ﷺ) as saying: If anyone gets a dog, except a sheeping or hunting or a farm dog, a qirat of his reward will be deducted daily

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي اتِّخَاذِ الْكَلْبِ لِلصَّيْدِ وَغَيْرِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Using A Dog For Hunting And Other Than That
